name: Garden of Geese
description:
Walk around in a nice garden, listen to the calming music and herd some geese! There is no goal or challenges here (or any gameplay really), only a question; how many geese can you find?

For the Secret Santa 2021 jam, and my first solo game* ever! Barely a game, mostly just a level - made by an artist who hadn't touched a line of code in Unreal Engine before, sorely defeated by simple coding and falling sorely short of the original goal of the game, but very proud to have managed to create this still. Gamemaking is hard! I've learnt much about coding, model-making and how to wrangle gamemaking programs along the way.

Character models, ground textures, some environment assets and all code made by me. Most trees and foliage from Dreamscapes https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/item/b4514562504e434db2a03c84b86b..., and music from https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ultimate-sfx-music-bundle....
